description: The updated Altra Lone Peak 4 RSM is ready for any weather you choose to run through. As its name suggests, this member of the Altra All-Weather Series (AWS) is ready for Rain, Snow, and Mud (RSM). The upper is made of eVent ® , which is 100% waterproof and offers market leading breathability, delivering maximum comfort and protection in the widest range of conditions. In addition, it features a 4-Point GaiterTrap™ and stickier than ever MaxTrac™ outsole with multi-directional lugs.
name: Altra Lone Peak RSM Low - Mens
